title: Hawaiian Roller Coaster Ride (D)
lyrics:
[intro]
Aloha e, aloha e (Aloha e, aloha e)
'Ano 'ai ke aloha e ('Ano 'ai ke aloha e)
Aloha ae, aloha e (Aloha e, aloha e)
'Ano 'ai ke aloha e ('Ano 'ai ke aloha e)
 
| (D) (D) (D) (G) | x2
 
[chorus]
(D)There’s no place I’d rather (G)be
((D)Than on my surfboard out at sea)
(D)Lingering in the ocean (G)blue
((D)And If I had one wish come true)
I’d (G)surf till the sun sets
Be-(G)yond the horizon
((D)A wiki wiki mai lohi (G)lohi
(D)Lawe mai i ko papa he'e nalu)       
(A) Flyin by on the Ha(G)waiian roller coaster (D)ride

(D)A wiki wiki mai lohi (G)lohi
((D)Lawe mai i ko papa he nalu)
(D)Pi'i na nalu la laha(G)laha
((D)O ka moana hanupanupa)
(A)Lalala i kala hanahana
((G)Me ke kai hoene i ka pu'e one)
(D)Helehele mai kakou e
((D-stop)Hawaiian roller coaster ride)
 
[chorus]
(D)There’s no place I’d rather (G)be
((D)Than on the seashore dry, wet free)
(D)On golden sand is where I (G)lay
((D)And If I only had my way)
I’d (G)play till the sun sets
Be-(G)yond the horizon
((D)Lalala i kala hana(G)hana
(D)Me ke kai hoene i ka pu'e one)
(A) It's time to try the Ha(G)waiian roller coaster (D)ride
 
(D)Hang loose, hang ten, howzit, shake a (G)shaka
(D)No worry, no fear, ain't no biggie braddah
(D)Cuttin' in, cuttin' up, cuttin' back, (G)cuttin' out
(D)Frontside, backside, goofy footed, wipe out
(A)Let's get jumpin', surf's up and pumpin'
(G)Coastin' with the motion of the ocean
(D)Whirlpools swirling, twisting,and turning
((D-stop)Hawaiian roller coaster ride)

[interlude]
| (D) (D) (D) (G) | x2
| (A) | (G) | 
 
[chorus]
(D)There’s no place I’d rather (G)be
((D)Than on my surfboard out at sea)
(D)Lingering in the ocean (G)blue
((D)And If I had one wish come true)
I’d (G)surf till the sun sets
Be-(G)yond the horizon
((D)A wiki wiki mai lohi (G)lohi
(D)Lawe mai i ko papa he'e nalu)       
(A) Flyin by on the Ha(G)waiian roller coaster (D)ride
 
[outro]
(D)A wiki wiki mai lohi (G)lohi
((D)Lawe mai i ko papa he nalu)
(D)Pi'i na nalu la laha(G)laha
((D)O ka moana hanupanupa)
(A)Lalala i kala hanahana
((G)Me ke kai hoene i ka pu'e one)
(D)Helehele mai kakou e
((D-stop)Hawaiian roller coaster ride) [end]
